mapper.sql: SELECT COUNT(mao.id) AS appt_count, mao.shop_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order mao WHERE mao.appt_status IN (1, 2) AND id > #{apptOrderId} GROUP BY mao.shop_id

SELECT shop_id, COUNT(contents) AS evaluation_count, FORMAT((SUM((IFNULL(serve_rank,0) + IFNULL(entertain_rank,0) + IFNULL(environment_rank,0))/3) / COUNT(contents)),1) AS evaluation_score FROM mtmydb.mtmy_shop_comment WHERE id > #{commentId} GROUP BY shop_id
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT t1.id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_shop_comment t1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT t1.shop_id AS 'shopId', t1.appt_count AS 'apptCount', IFNULL(t2.evaluation_count, 0)AS 'evaluationCount', IFNULL(t2.evaluation_score, 0)AS 'evaluationScore', IFNULL((SELECT tss.shop_id FROM trains.train_shop_statistics tss WHERE tss.shop_id = t1.shop_id),"NULL")AS 'isExist' FROM () t1 LEFT JOIN () t2 ON t2.shop_id = t1.shop_id
